headline: APLD Trades Higher Than Industry at 13.5X P/S: Is the Stock a Buy?
summary: Despite a stretched valuation, APLD's AI-focused strategy, long-term contracts and Polaris Forge buildout makes the stock attractive for investors.

raw.headline: APLD Trades Higher Than Industry at 13.5X P/S: Is the Stock a Buy?
raw.summary: Despite a stretched valuation, APLD's AI-focused strategy, long-term contracts and Polaris Forge buildout makes the stock attractive for investors.

headline: Equinix Named a Leader in the IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Datacenter Colocation Services 2025 Vendor Assessment
summary: Equinix, Inc. (Nasdaq: EQIX), the world's digital infrastructure company®, has been recognized as a Leader in the IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Datacenter Colocation Services 2025 Vendor Assessment (doc. #US52983725, August 2025) for its comprehensive product portfolio, strategy, and keen focus on innovation and continuous evolution to anticipate and meet the future requirements of its customer base.
